Package reskue.culturalasset

Class CulturalAssetController

java.lang.Object
kueres.base.BaseController<E,​R,​S>
reskue.ReskueController<CulturalAssetEntity,​CulturalAssetRepository,​CulturalAssetService>
reskue.culturalasset.CulturalAssetController
@RestController
@RequestMapping("/api/culturalAsset")
public class CulturalAssetController
extends ReskueController<CulturalAssetEntity,​CulturalAssetRepository,​CulturalAssetService>
The TaskController provides API functions for TaskEntities. These functions are: - all functions of the BaseController in kueres.base - all functions of the ReskueController in reskue - finding all cultural assets in a radius around a given point - finding all tasks of a cultural asset - finding all children of a cultural asset - finding all notifications of a cultural asset - calculating the distance from a point to a cultural asset - adding a child to a cultural asset - removing a child from a cultural asset - setting the parent of a cultural asset - removing the parent from a cultural asset
Since:
Feb 25, 2021
Version:
1.0
Author:
Jan Straßburg, jan.strassburg@student.kit.edu

  • Method Details

    • findInRadius

      @GetMapping("/radius") @RolesAllowed({"administrator","helper"}) public org.springframework.data.domain.Page<CulturalAssetEntity> findInRadius​(@RequestParam double radius, @RequestParam double longitude, @RequestParam double latitude, @RequestParam java.util.Optional<java.lang.String[]> filter, @RequestParam java.util.Optional<java.lang.String[]> sort, @RequestParam java.util.Optional<java.lang.Integer> page, @RequestParam java.util.Optional<java.lang.Integer> size)
      Find all cultural assets in a radius around a given middle point. The result can filtered, sorted and paged.

      See kueres.query.SearchCriteria for filter syntax.

      See kueres.query.SortBuilder for sort syntax.

      Parameters:
      radius - - the radius of the search.
      longitude - - the longitude of the middle of the search.
      latitude - - the latitude of the middle of the search.
      filter - - the filter options.
      sort - - the sort options.
      page - - the number of the page used for pagination.
      size - - the size of the page used for pagination.
      Returns:
      The result as a page.

    • getAllTasks

      @GetMapping("/{id}/tasks") @RolesAllowed({"administrator","helper"}) public org.springframework.data.domain.Page<TaskEntity> getAllTasks​(@PathVariable("id") long id, @RequestParam java.util.Optional<java.lang.String[]> filter, @RequestParam java.util.Optional<java.lang.String[]> sort, @RequestParam java.util.Optional<java.lang.Integer> page, @RequestParam java.util.Optional<java.lang.Integer> size)
      Find all tasks of the cultural asset. The result can filtered, sorted and paged.

      See kueres.query.SearchCriteria for filter syntax.

      Parameters:

      page - - the number of the page used for pagination.
      size - - the size of the page used for pagination.

    • getDistance

      @GetMapping("/{id}/distance") @RolesAllowed({"administrator","helper"}) public double getDistance​(@PathVariable("id") long id, @RequestParam double longitude, @RequestParam double latitude)
